CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(Viewpath__VP_Project__c),
HYPERLINK("apex/Viewpath__VP_Project_New?CF00NA0000000l3I6="& Name & "&Name="&Name&"&CF00NA0000000l3I6_lkid=" & Id & "&retURL=/" & Id, IMAGE("/resource/Viewpath__Button_Create_Viewpath_Project", "Create Viewpath Project"),"_self"),
HYPERLINK("/"+Viewpath__VP_Project__c, Viewpath__VP_Project__r.Name, "_self") )
CustomField.label: Viewpath Project
